headline: Is FactSet at a Turning Point After 40% Drop and New AI Data Partnership?
summary: Thinking about what to do with FactSet Research Systems stock? You are not alone. With the share price closing at $286.67 and swinging between positive and negative territory, it's been a choppy ride for investors. The stock gained 1.3% in the past week, but when you zoom out, that strength barely dents the bigger picture: a 14.7% decline over the past month and a staggering 39.8% drop since the start of the year. Pull back even further and the long-term returns tell a similar story, with the...
